actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to establish a program to provide environmental assistance to non-Federal interests in western Pennsylvania, and for other purposes.
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control
Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to establish a program to provide environmental assistance to non-Federal interests in Allegheny, Beaver, Butler, Lawrence, and Mercer Counties, Pennsylvania, for publicly owned water supply, water resource protection, waste, and environmental restoration projects.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to establish a program to provide environmental assistance to non-Federal interests in western Pennsylvania, and for other purposes.
